items.title: Launched My Personal Website
items.text:
I finally launched my personal website — something I've been dreaming about for years.

Built from scratch in a month using React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite, the site showcases my product journey and AI work including Tract, MIApp, and Digital Saathi.

I'm now planning to integrate a LangChain-powered AI Agent and a chatbot to make it more interactive. This site is more than a portfolio — it reflects my passion and technical skills.

en.title: Launched My Personal Website
en.text:
I finally launched my personal website — something I've been dreaming about for years.

Built from scratch in a month using React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite, the site showcases my product journey and AI work including Tract, MIApp, and Digital Saathi.

I'm now planning to integrate a LangChain-powered AI Agent and a chatbot to make it more interactive. This site is more than a portfolio — it reflects my passion and technical skills.
